text: Hakha Chin is a language spoken in southern Asia by 446,264 people.Hakha- China, Ethnologue, 1983, 1991, 1996, 2000, access date August 9, 2008 The total figure includes 2,000 Zokhua, and 60,100 Lai speakers. The speakers are largely concentrated in eastern India in addition to Myanmar/Burma and Bangladesh. == References == Category:Languages of Bangladesh Category:Sino- Tibetan languages
title: Hakha Chin language
